Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Examination of structures and goals of offices and prosecution and criminal trial courts, and of the processes of charging, adjudicating, and sentencing defendants.

College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Examines the myriad theoretical, empirical and operational issues involved in criminal sentencing policy in American society.
